Reference

All functions

align_layers()

Harmonise projection, resolution and extent of a list of rasters

borders0()

Outer boundaries of a vector map

compute_weights()

Compute MCDA weights

csv_sep()

Detection of separator in csv files

distance_map()

Compute a distance map to spatial features

distance_to_vector()

Distance to vector features

download_country_admin()

Download Country Administrative Borders from GADM

epidemic_threshold()

Compute the Epidemic Threshold of a graph

is.reciprocal()

Check reciprocal matrix

layer_type()

Detect type of geographic information

load_dir()

Load all layers within a directory

load_layer()

Load a map layer

mapMCDA

mapMCDA

mapMCDA_app()

mapMCDA Shiny web interface

mapMCDA_datasets()

Load packaged Cameroon layers into memory

rasterize(<geonetwork>,<Raster>) rasterize(<geonetwork>,<SpatialPolygons>)

Rasterize a geographic network

read_network()

Read and interpret network data

resolution()

Compute a suitable resolution for a map

risk_layer()

Compute risk layer

risk_plot()

Produce final plot of risk

risk_table()

Produce final table of risk levels by epidemiological unit

risk_unit()

Risk by epidemiological unit

rmext()

Remove filename extension

voronoi()

Voronoi polygons

wlc()

Weighted Linear Combination of risk factors
